remarks: Lemma for ~ occl .  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2000.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
occl.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ ~H ) $.
occl.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. Cauchy ) $.
occl.3 $e |- ( ph -> F : NN --> ( _|_ ` A ) ) $.
occl.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. A ) $.
occllem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ~~>v ` F ) .ih B ) = 0 ) $.
